text: allaah tumhaaree santaan ke vishay mein tumhen aadesh deta hai ki do betiyon ke hisse ke baraabar ek bete ka hissa hoga; aur yadi do se adhik betiyaan hee ho to unaka hissa chhodee huee sampatti ka do tihaee hai. aur yadi vah akelee ho to usake lie aadha hai. aur yadi maranevaale kee santaan ho jo usake maan-baap mein se pratyek ka usake chhode hue maal ka chhatha hissa hai. aur yadi vah nissantaan ho aur usake maan-baap hee usake vaaris hon, to usakee maan ka hissa tihaee hoga. aur yadi usake bhaee bhee ho, to usaka maan ka chhatha hissa hoga. ye hisse, vaseeyat jo vah kar jae pooree karane ya rn chuka dene ke pashchaat hai. tumhaare baap bhee hai aur tumhaare bete bhee. tum nahin jaanate ki unamen se laabh pahunchaane kee drshti se kaun tumase adhik nikat hai. yah hissa allaah ka nishchit kiya hua hai. allaah sab kuchh jaanata, samajhata hai
